header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting, anecdote telling, making arrangements

yeah I I remember watching this thing on TV where like they were saying that erm a lot of criminals have started cos erm they can basically they can work out your code based on cos if so say you've got like four numbers if it's the person right behind you thirty-three erm if you if they come right after you they can do this thing where they like basically they put like this plastic sheet on the thing
and so they can see what the last four
cos of the cos you leave heat marks or something

or actually it's an app it's an app so that if they hold their phone over the erm payment thing it can pick up the heat signals like it's like thermal you know like the thermal imaging that you see the police interceptors using?
like it's an app that does the same thing so what it does is it highlights the last four numbers that were used and obviously that really limits what the the kind of

and I was seconds away from opening the kitchen door and seeing that person at that window if I'd have done that I would have had to leave

yeah cos as you sa er obviously she was like fairly recently single as well so I think
she was like she wasn't really used to just being the only one in the house so
I think he really shook her it wasn't long after that that we moved
I don't think it was linked I think that there was a lot of reasons why we moved but I do think mum just didn't feel very safe there anymore
we certainly went through a period of having to lock the door as soon as you got in the house which just wasn't a very nice feeling
we do that now though I think it's it's not a bad habit to get into is it really?
yeah it's changed everything's changed the world's changed

didn't used to I do it now I certainly do now

in the kitchen and the TV's on and the door's closed
yeah yeah you wouldn't have a clue
and there's been a few times I've heard things and I felt oh it's the cat but perhaps you should check

after Christmas it'll die down probably
it'll die down and I think as well like I'm I'm I'm getting used to it because I think more than anything it's a mental adjustment

to him so I really can't complain
do you only have half an hour for lunch?

if I leave late and get in late that works but if you try and do anything that's remotely around the peak times you've got no chance leaving between four and half past five it'll take you an hour and a half to get home and if you leave between sort of half past seven and half past eight in the morning
and remember bank holidays I remember what happened that May bank holiday and you got home at seven something I remember that
